snippet: Amy Bishop, a former biology professor, pleaded guilty to fatally shooting three colleagues and wounding three others at the University of Alabama in Huntsville in 2010.
abstract: Former biology professor Amy Bishop pleads guilty to fatally shooting three colleagues and wounding three others at the University of Alabama in Huntsville in 2010; prosecutors agree to recommend a sentence of life without parole for the capital murder charge and three life sentences for the attempted murder charges.
lead_paragraph: Amy Bishop, a former biology professor, pleaded guilty to fatally shooting three colleagues and wounding three others at the University of Alabama in Huntsville in 2010.

headline.seo: Amy Bishop, Ex-Professor, Pleads Guilty in 3 Deaths
